lenders.name: Global Cycling for KIVA
lenders.loan_because: I want to make positive changes in other people's lives. I will begin a Global Cycle from the Arctic Circle, Canada in 2010 to raise awareness for global change and use the adventure as a beacon that will encourage donations ($1 will do!) that keep on giving in the Kiva lending program (READ MORE ABOUT KIVA - THEN PLEASE DONATE TO THIS CHARITY RIDE). I believe from our hands, great things can happen in other people's lives just a few prayers away. I will support the Kiva foundation & ONE Cycle, One Man, One Charity in 2010 to make a global impact for those who need us the most.  I'll ride the bike to inspire others to ride for charity, make a small donation (anything is more than nothing) and we'll see dreams happen.
